idea-plugin.name: Lines Sorter Plus
idea-plugin.description:
Adds support to alphabetically sort lines or JSON objects.
  • Sorts selected lines alphabetically
  • Sorts whole file if selection is empty
  • Sorts plaintext
  • Sorts JSON objects (in JSON files)
Just select lines and call either Edit â†’ Lines Sorter Plus, or Alt + Shift + L shortcut. When no lines are selected, the whole file is sorted.

The plugin is based on Sylvain Francois' Line Sorter.

Code on GitHub | Follow the author (@bennycode) | Sort JSON
